mapper.insert: insert into marketing_merchant (id, company_name, company_short, industry_id, contacter, tel, district, city, province, country, address, main_products, main_brand, merchant_type, step, parent_id, bank_no, bank_address, remark, add_time, add_user, last_update, last_updater, status, fax_no, credit_code, marketing_no, bank_user, system_name, acquirer, fans, system_icon) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyShort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{industryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contacter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainProducts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainBrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{step,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{addUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{faxNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{marketingNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{systemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acquirer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fans,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{systemIcon,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY})

update marketing_merchant set company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_short = #{companyShort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, industry_id = #{industryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contacter = #{contacter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, district = #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, main_products = #{mainProducts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, main_brand = #{mainBrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, merchant_type = #{merchantType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, step = #{step,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_no = #{bankNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_address = #{bankAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, add_user = #{addUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update = #{lastUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_updater = #{lastUpdater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fax_no = #{faxNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, credit_code = #{creditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, marketing_no = #{marketingNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_user = #{bankUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, system_name = #{systemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, acquirer = #{acquirer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fans = #{fans,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: /*select * from marketing_merchant*/ select m.id as id,m.company_name,m.company_short, m.industry_id,m.contacter, m.tel, m.district,m.city, m.province, m.country,m.address, m.main_products, m.main_brand,m.merchant_type,m.step, m.parent_id,m.bank_no, m.bank_address, m.remark, m.add_time, m.add_user, m.last_update, m.last_updater, m.status, m.fax_no, m.credit_code,m.marketing_no,m.bank_user,m.acquirer,m.fans, a.company_name as parentName,bi.industry_name as industryName from marketing_merchant m left join marketing_merchant a on m.parent_id=a.id left join base_industry bi on m.industry_id=bi.id WHERE m.merchant_type IN (0,3)

select m.id as id,m.company_name,m.company_short, m.industry_id,m.contacter, m.tel, m.district,m.city, m.province, m.country,m.address, m.main_products, m.main_brand,m.merchant_type,m.step, m.parent_id,m.bank_no, m.bank_address, m.remark, m.add_time, m.add_user, m.last_update, m.last_updater, m.status,m.acquirer,m.fans, m.fax_no, m.credit_code,m.marketing_no,m.bank_user, a.company_name as parentName,bi.industry_name as industryName from marketing_merchant m left join marketing_merchant a on m.parent_id=a.id left join base_industry bi on m.industry_id=bi.id where m.merchant_type=1

select m.id as id,m.company_name,m.company_short, m.industry_id,m.contacter, m.tel, m.district,m.city, m.province, m.country,m.address, m.main_products, m.main_brand,m.merchant_type,m.step, m.parent_id,m.bank_no, m.bank_address, m.remark, m.add_time, m.add_user, m.last_update, m.last_updater, m.status,m.acquirer,m.fans, m.fax_no, m.credit_code,m.marketing_no,m.bank_user, a.company_name as parentName,bi.industry_name as industryName from marketing_merchant m left join marketing_merchant a on m.parent_id=a.id left join base_industry bi on m.industry_id=bi.id where m.merchant_type=#{merchantType} and m.step=#{step}

select m.id as id,m.company_name,m.company_short, m.industry_id,m.contacter, m.tel, m.district,m.city, m.province, m.country,m.address, m.main_products, m.main_brand,m.merchant_type,m.step, m.parent_id,m.bank_no, m.bank_address, m.remark, m.add_time, m.add_user, m.last_update, m.last_updater, m.status, m.fax_no, m.credit_code,m.marketing_no,m.bank_user,m.acquirer,m.fans, a.company_name as parentName,bi.industry_name as industryName from marketing_merchant m left join marketing_merchant a on m.parent_id=a.id left join base_industry bi on m.industry_id=bi.id where m.id=#{id}

select m.id as id,m.company_name,m.company_short, m.industry_id,m.contacter, m.tel, m.district,m.city, m.province, m.country,m.address, m.main_products, m.main_brand,m.merchant_type,m.step, m.parent_id,m.bank_no, m.bank_address, m.remark, m.add_time, m.add_user, m.last_update, m.last_updater, m.status, m.fax_no, m.credit_code,m.marketing_no,m.bank_user, a.company_name as parentName,bi.industry_name as industryName,m.acquirer,m.fans from marketing_merchant m left join marketing_merchant a on m.parent_id=a.id left join base_industry bi on m.industry_id=bi.id where m.merchant_type=#{merchantType} and m.parent_id=#{parentId} order by m.add_time desc

select m.id as id,m.company_name,m.company_short, m.industry_id,m.contacter, m.tel, m.district,m.city, m.province, m.country,m.address, m.main_products, m.main_brand,m.merchant_type,m.step, m.parent_id,m.bank_no, m.bank_address, m.remark, m.add_time, m.add_user, m.last_update, m.last_updater, m.status, m.fax_no, m.credit_code,m.marketing_no,m.bank_user, a.company_name as parentName,bi.industry_name as industryName,m.acquirer,m.fans from marketing_merchant m left join marketing_merchant a on m.parent_id=a.id left join base_industry bi on m.industry_id=bi.id where m.merchant_type=1 order by m.add_time desc

select m.id as id,m.company_name,m.add_time, a.company_name as parentName,count(b.phone) as fans from marketing_merchant m left join marketing_merchant a on m.parent_id=a.id left JOIN marketing_member b on m.id=b.merchant_id where m.merchant_type=1 GROUP BY m.id order by m.add_time desc

select m.id as id,m.company_name,m.company_short, m.industry_id,m.contacter, m.tel, m.district,m.city, m.province, m.country,m.address, m.main_products, m.main_brand,m.merchant_type,m.step, m.parent_id,m.bank_no, m.bank_address, m.remark, m.add_time, m.add_user, m.last_update, m.last_updater, m.status, m.fax_no, m.credit_code,m.marketing_no,m.bank_user,m.system_name, a.company_name as parentName,bi.industry_name as industryName,m.acquirer,m.fans from marketing_merchant m left join marketing_merchant a on m.parent_id=a.id left join base_industry bi on m.industry_id=bi.id where m.id=#{id}
SELECT * FROM marketing_merchant WHERE merchant_type=0 order by add_time desc

select m.id as id,m.company_name,m.company_short, m.industry_id,m.contacter, m.tel, m.district,m.city, m.province, m.country,m.address, m.main_products, m.main_brand,m.merchant_type,m.step, m.parent_id,m.bank_no, m.bank_address, m.remark, m.add_time, m.add_user, m.last_update, m.last_updater, m.status, m.fax_no, m.credit_code,m.marketing_no,m.bank_user, a.company_name as parentName,bi.industry_name as industryName,m.acquirer,m.fans from marketing_merchant m left join marketing_merchant a on m.parent_id=a.id left join base_industry bi on m.industry_id=bi.id where m.merchant_type=#{merchantType} and m.parent_id=#{parentId} and m.company_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{selectValue}), '%') order by m.add_time desc

select m.id as id,m.company_name,m.company_short, m.industry_id,m.contacter, m.tel, m.district,m.city, m.province, m.country,m.address, m.main_products, m.main_brand,m.merchant_type,m.step, m.parent_id,m.bank_no, m.bank_address, m.remark, m.add_time, m.add_user, m.last_update, m.last_updater, m.status, m.fax_no, m.credit_code,m.marketing_no,m.bank_user, a.company_name as parentName,bi.industry_name as industryName,m.acquirer,m.fans from marketing_merchant m left join marketing_merchant a on m.parent_id=a.id left join base_industry bi on m.industry_id=bi.id where m.merchant_type=#{merchantType} and m.parent_id=#{parentId} and bi.industry_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{selectValue}), '%') order by m.add_time desc

select m.id as id,m.company_name,m.company_short, m.industry_id,m.contacter, m.tel, m.district,m.city, m.province, m.country,m.address, m.main_products, m.main_brand,m.merchant_type,m.step, m.parent_id,m.bank_no, m.bank_address, m.remark, m.add_time, m.add_user, m.last_update, m.last_updater, m.status, m.fax_no, m.credit_code,m.marketing_no,m.bank_user, a.company_name as parentName,bi.industry_name as industryName,m.acquirer,m.fans from marketing_merchant m left join marketing_merchant a on m.parent_id=a.id left join base_industry bi on m.industry_id=bi.id where m.merchant_type=#{merchantType} and m.parent_id=#{parentId} and m.address like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{selectValue}), '%') order by m.add_time desc

select m.id as id,m.company_name,m.company_short, m.industry_id,m.contacter, m.tel, m.district,m.city, m.province, m.country,m.address, m.main_products, m.main_brand,m.merchant_type,m.step, m.parent_id,m.bank_no, m.bank_address, m.remark, m.add_time, m.add_user, m.last_update, m.last_updater, m.status, m.fax_no, m.credit_code,m.marketing_no,m.bank_user, a.company_name as parentName,bi.industry_name as industryName,m.acquirer,m.fans from marketing_merchant m left join marketing_merchant a on m.parent_id=a.id left join base_industry bi on m.industry_id=bi.id where m.merchant_type=#{merchantType} and m.parent_id=#{parentId} and m.main_products like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{selectValue}), '%') order by m.add_time desc

select m.id as id,m.company_name,m.company_short, m.industry_id,m.contacter, m.tel, m.district,m.city, m.province, m.country,m.address, m.main_products, m.main_brand,m.merchant_type,m.step, m.parent_id,m.bank_no, m.bank_address, m.remark, m.add_time, m.add_user, m.last_update, m.last_updater, m.status, m.fax_no, m.credit_code,m.marketing_no,m.bank_user, a.company_name as parentName,bi.industry_name as industryName,m.acquirer,m.fans from marketing_merchant m left join marketing_merchant a on m.parent_id=a.id left join base_industry bi on m.industry_id=bi.id where m.merchant_type=#{merchantType} and m.parent_id=#{parentId} and m.main_brand=like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{selectValue}), '%') order by m.add_time desc
SELECT * from marketing_merchant WHERE parent_id=#{parentId} order by add_time desc
select id as merchantId,appId,appKey,appSecret from marketing_merchant where id=#{merchantId}
select sum(fans) from marketing_merchant
select COUNT(*) from marketing_merchant WHERE DATE_FORMAT(add_time,'%Y%m%d')=#{mytime}
